name: FINGERS ON THE PULSE
description: FINGERS ON THE PULSE relates to the need for being present and in the moment and yet this past year being completely out of the moment. This desire to be normal or a return for normalcy was at a peak level around this time, so ON FINGERS THE PULSE. So what we get is the inverse of our desire in the first part of the anagram and the second part is static and unchanging; the pulse represents time itself. In essence, these expectations are compared to our realities within the dimension of time and welcome to 2021. Normalcy is a mirage in the far distance of future experience. We all want it, but it's illusive properties create an intangible desire like looking at old playboy/playgirl magazines from yesteryear.
